recommendations.action: Update failing color combinations to meet WCAG 2.2 AA standards (4.5:1 for normal text, 3:1 for large text)
recommendations.impact: Critical accessibility issue affecting users with visual impairments

recommendations.issue: Color combinations only suitable for large text
recommendations.action: Consider strengthening these combinations or ensure they are only used for large text (18pt+ or 14pt+ bold)
recommendations.impact: Limited accessibility - may cause issues for users with visual impairments when used with normal-sized text

recommendations.action: Run this audit regularly when adding new colors or updating the design system
recommendations.impact: Preventive measure to maintain accessibility standards
